title: VR Simulation Education Based on Dual Contrast Pedagogy (DCP) for Enhancing AI Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary computer literacy and middle-school-level comprehension of science/technology
context.additional_context: For learners preparing for medical/legal/technical professions, core AI concepts are taught through simulation and VR experiences in a BYOD setting

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of machine learning and language model operations through human-AI comparisons
Learners can analyze ethical dilemmas in AI system decision-making processes and propose solutions using the DCP approach
Learners demonstrate collaborative problem-solving skills by completing an AI application design project in a VR simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
